queryMap.query: SELECT /* tbdm_user_login */ A.USER_ID -- 사용자ID , A.USER_NM -- 사용자명 , A.PSWD -- 비밀번호 , B.DUTY_GRP_CD -- 업무그룹코드 , A.DEPT_CD -- 부서코드 , A.DEPT_NM -- 부서이름 , A.TEAM_CD -- 팀코드 , A.TEAM_NM -- 팀이름 , A.FLOC -- 직위코드 , A.FGRADE -- 직위 , A.TEL_NO -- 전화번호 , B.HP_NO -- 휴대폰번호 , B.STR_DT -- 유효기간 시작일자 , B.END_DT -- 유효기간 종료일자 , B.INST_ID -- 작성자ID , B.INST_DTM -- 작성일시 , B.UPDT_ID -- 수정자ID , B.UPDT_DTM -- 수정일시 , '001' AS MBR_CD FROM USRBM.TBRK_USER A, TBDM_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.USER_ID = ? AND B.STR_DT <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND B.END_DT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')

WITH MN_LOGIN AS ( /* tbdm_nm_login */ SELECT T1.MN_ID -- 메뉴아이디 , T1.MN_NM -- 메뉴명 , T1.ORD_NO -- 순서번호 , T1.UP_MN_ID -- 상위메뉴ID , T1.SCRN_ID -- 화면ID , T1.URL -- 메뉴URL , T1.RMK -- 비고 , SRCH_YN -- 조회여부 , INPT_YN -- 입력여부 , APRV_YN -- 승인여부 , LVL -- 메뉴 레벨 , RN , T3.UP_MN_ID AS UP_UP_MN_ID FROM ( SELECT TM.* ,LEVEL - 1 AS LVL ,ROWNUM AS RN FROM TBDM_MN TM START WITH TM.MN_ID ='000000000' CONNECT BY PRIOR TM.MN_ID = TM.UP_MN_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY UP_MN_ID, ORD_NO ) T1 , ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TMA.MN_ID , DECODE(TMA.SRCH_YN, 'Y', 'T', 'F') SRCH_YN -- 조회여부 , DECODE(TMA.INPT_YN, 'Y', 'T', 'F') INPT_YN -- 입력여부 , DECODE(TMA.APRV_YN, 'Y', 'T', 'F') APRV_YN -- 승인여부 FROM TBDM_MN_AUTH_HIST TMA, ( SELECT VU.USER_ID FROM TBDM_AUTH_APLY_DEPT TAAD, VWEA_USER VU WHERE TAAD.USER_ID = VU.USER_ID AND TAAD.TEAM_CD = VU.TEAM_CD ) A WHERE TMA.USER_ID = ? AND TMA.SRCH_YN = 'Y' AND TMA.USER_ID = A.USER_ID AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') BETWEEN TMA.STR_DT_TM AND TMA.END_DT_TM ) WHERE MN_ID NOT IN( SELECT MN_ID FROM TBDM_MN WHERE PERSONAL_DATA_MN = 'Y' AND MN_ID NOT IN (SELECT MN_ID FROM TBDM_MN_AUTH_HIST WHERE USER_ID = ? AND PERSONAL_YN = 'Y' AND PERSONAL_AUTH_CHK='Y' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') BETWEEN STR_DT_TM AND END_DT_TM AND PERSONAL_MN_IP LIKE '%' || ? || '%' ) )
) T2 , TBDM_MN T3 WHERE T1.MN_ID = T2.MN_ID(+) AND T1.UP_MN_ID = T3.MN_ID ) SELECT * FROM MN_LOGIN WHERE MN_ID IN ( SELECT UP_MN_ID FROM MN_LOGIN WHERE SRCH_YN ='T' GROUP BY UP_MN_ID UNION SELECT UP_UP_MN_ID FROM MN_LOGIN WHERE SRCH_YN ='T' GROUP BY UP_UP_MN_ID ) OR SRCH_YN IS NOT NULL ORDER BY RN

SELECT /* tbdm_user_login_view */ A.USER_ID -- 사용자ID , A.USER_NM -- 사용자명 , A.PSWD -- 비밀번호 , B.DUTY_GRP_CD -- 업무그룹코드 , A.DEPT_CD -- 부서코드 , A.DEPT_NM -- 부서이름 , A.TEAM_CD -- 팀코드 , A.TEAM_NM -- 팀이름 , A.FLOC -- 직위코드 , A.FGRADE -- 직위 , A.TEL_NO -- 전화번호 , A.HP_NO -- 휴대폰번호 , B.STR_DT -- 유효기간 시작일자 , B.END_DT -- 유효기간 종료일자 , NULL CAN_CD , 'F' ISVALID , B.INST_ID -- 작성자ID , B.INST_DTM -- 작성일시 , B.UPDT_ID -- 수정자ID , B.UPDT_DTM -- 수정일시 , '001' AS MBR_CD , NULL AS LOG_SEQ , A.PSWD_CHK , A.LOGIN_DT FROM USRBM.TBRK_USER A, TBDM_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.USER_ID = NVL(?, B.USER_ID) --AND B.STR_DT <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') --AND B.END_DT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT /* last_login_time */ LOGIN_DT, PC_IP FROM ( SELECT /* last_login_time */ LOG_SEQ, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY LOG_SEQ DESC) RN, TO_CHAR(LOGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS LOGIN_DT, PC_IP FROM TBDM_USER_TRACE WHERE ENO = ? ) WHERE RN = 2
SELECT /* user_trace_key */ SQ_TBDM_USER_TRACE.NEXTVAL AS LOG_SEQ FROM DUAL
INSERT /* user_trace_insert */ INTO TBDM_USER_TRACE ( LOG_SEQ, ENO, PC_IP, OS_VER, LOGIN_DT) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, SYSDATE )
UPDATE TBDM_USER_TRACE /* user_trace_update */ SET NAVI_PATH = NAVI_PATH ||'|'||? WHERE LOG_SEQ = ?
UPDATE TBDM_USER_TRACE /* user_trace_finish */ SET LOGOUT_DT = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') WHERE LOG_SEQ = ? AND LOGOUT_DT IS NULL

MERGE /* user_login_chk_save */ INTO TBDM_LOGIN_DUP_CHK DST USING ( SELECT ? AS USER_ID ,? AS SESSION_ID FROM DUAL ) SRC ON ( DST.USER_ID = SRC.USER_ID ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET DST.SESSION_ID = SRC.SESSION_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( USER_ID ,SESSION_ID ) VALUES ( SRC.USER_ID ,SRC.SESSION_ID )
SELECT SESSION_ID FROM TBDM_LOGIN_DUP_CHK WHERE USER_ID = ?

INSERT /* personal_access_insert */ INTO TBDM_PSNL_ACCESS ( LOG_SEQ, SEQ_NO, FORM_ID, ACCESS_DT, JOB_TYPE, ACTION, PARAM) VALUES ( ?, (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ_NO),0)+1 FROM TBDM_PSNL_ACCESS WHERE LOG_SEQ = ?), ?, SYSDATE, ?, ?, ? )
SELECT PSWD_CHK , LOGIN_DT FROM USRBM.TBRK_USER WHERE USER_ID = ?

UPDATE USRBM.TBRK_USER SET PSWD_CHK = (SELECT CASE WHEN PSWD_CHK IS NULL THEN '1' ELSE TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(PSWD_CHK)+1) END AS PSWD_CHK FROM USRBM.TBRK_USER WHERE USER_ID = ? ), LOGIN_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') WHERE USER_ID = ?
UPDATE USRBM.TBRK_USER SET PSWD_CHK = '0', LOGIN_DT = '' WHERE USER_ID = ?

INSERT /* personal_mn_access_insert */ INTO TBDM_PERSONAL_MN_ACCESS ( LOG_SEQ, SEQ_NO, FORM_ID, ACCESS_DT, JOB_TYPE, ACTION, PARAM, USER_IP, USER_ID ) VALUES ( ?, (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ_NO),0)+1 FROM TBDM_PERSONAL_MN_ACCESS WHERE LOG_SEQ = ?), ?, SYSDATE, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
